website_summaries.verdict: Many people prefer the breathable and comfortable nature of wool over fleece or polyester, and this neck warmer features high quality Merino wool.
pros: Breathable fabric reduces condensation and fogging
Material is soft and warm, not scratchy
Lightweight, but still provides good insulation
cons: Size is definitely small, may not fit larger female or male users
Merino wool material described as very thin
Price point is higher than expected

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but very small!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this neck gaiter - the wool is very nice, soft and itch-free. However, the gaiter is sized for very small people - I felt like it was strangling me. The diameter needs to be at least a couple of inches bigger, and it could be longer too. Or perhaps it just should be offered in different sizes. I gave mine to my 12-year-old niece and it's perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Flymo Mulch

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm facial protection for really cold weather.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, non-itchy and essential for freezing weather. This slips overs your head to warm your neck and can be pulled up to cover your face. It's not bulky so doesn't interfere with scarves and other clothing, and feels soft and cozy. I wore this during the 'bomb cyclone' in New England and it made a big difference to my overall warmth - it's definitely an essential piece of outdoor clothing.
customer_reviews.author: James Beswick

customer_reviews.title: Warm, soft and amazing color!
customer_reviews.text: I've got the Jade color. It's slightly less intense green than pictured, but very nice regardless. It is soft and warm, not itchy at all. I'm an average woman, 145 lbs, 5'-6", regular neck, but it feels borderline tight. Maybe too tight for a man. It's lightweight, like an under layer, but has double layer. Overall I really like it and loved the vibrant color options which are so rare nowadays.
customer_reviews.author: Edit Varga

customer_reviews.title: Warm but not long enough
customer_reviews.text: Very warm but not long enough to go up over your ears and down the back of your neck. Kept slipping down. Do enjoy it for cold mornings out on the water fishing though.
customer_reviews.author: H. Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Great For Running
customer_reviews.text: I wear this over my ears when I run. Keeps my ears warm while allowing the top of my head to "breath". Lightweight, easy to pack, dries quickly, no stink! Works well for me!
customer_reviews.author: AZ microbiologist

customer_reviews.title: Stretches out a little, but still a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Great for walking 15 min to the subway in NYC in 10 degrees! Only complaint is it's slightly loose for my head/face to begin with (I am small female)...and after one wear it stretched out at the top edge I had around my face so now it's definitely too loose. See photo...you can see how the top is wider than the bottom, where it stretched out. I will be sewing a line up the back to make it tighter, or maybe even dryer to shrink. Love the wool, not scratchy at all and definitely warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great neck gaiter but for very small necks
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the neck gaiter. The color is great (reversible green and green/grey striped). The merino wool is soft and the flat stitching is a plus. However, the diameter is much too small and it is too constricting on my 18" neck so I am returning it. I even tried to give it to my wife who has a small neck but it is too tight for her too. It would be 5 stars if it was bigger. I hope the manufacturer reads the comments and starts making a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Warm, great fit
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I lived before I bought this. I wear it nearly 24 / 7. Keeps a draft from hitting my neck at night, and is light-weight enough to wear around the office. Lovely soft purple colour which goes well with most of my sweaters.
customer_reviews.author: Go Natural

customer_reviews.title: Thin, but Warm
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying two of these because my Wife stole the first one. I bought it in January and now March this was well worth the money. I was worried that it wouldn't fit being that I am a larger man (6'5, 280lbs) it stretched no problem. Out of the box it was much thinner than I expected however it stood up and kept me warm in the cold and high winds while Ice fishing on an open lake in northern Wisconsin.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Verley

customer_reviews.title: A quality product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my 2nd neck gaiter. My 1st one lasted just over 13 months. I use it mon-fri 10+ hours a day while I'm working. I definitely got my moneys worth. It keeps the cold wind off my neck and I pull it up over my nose. Some people are complaining that it's too small. I don't want something really baggy around my neck. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: otaku4life

customer_reviews.title: Great protection from the cold, easy to clean, feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my wife before a trip to Iceland and she loved it. Wore it almost every day. Long enough to draw over the mouth and nose when the wind picks up. Because she is always cold, this has become a necessity for her when we travel, and the plum color goes well with lots of colors. Being all wool, when it gets a little gross after a couple days of hiking and breathing into it, it's easy to freshen it up with a thoroughly rinse in water, and then hang dry. Just ordered one for my mother before she takes a camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: aksupra7

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive but I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive but I like it a lot...really keeps the neck warm and looks good. My friend ordered one too. Im getting lots of wear out of it and most times dont bother with scarfs,,,as they say the most expensive clothes are the ones you dont wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jan LS

customer_reviews.title: Great air block, comfortable fit, serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Meets expectations in keeping neck area warm and cozy. Comfortable feel of fabric in sensitive area of the body. Great buffer when pulled up over mouth area for breathing in cold air when bicycling riding during winter months. In short period of ownership, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Cobber

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I have several old turtle fur neck gaitors I love. Really wanted a thinner wool one. Thinner, not so narrow it is quite most like a turtle neck without the coverage to the collarbone. Oh well. Worth a shot. I am not a large person by any means, but this seemed almost children sized.
customer_reviews.author: Jcp

customer_reviews.title: Woolx the right choice!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a better gaiter than the Buff I had previously bought on Amazon. The Buff was advertised as medium weight, it was actually really thin and developed holes in it after wearing it a few times. The Woolx was nice and thick, soft and warm. Very pleased with this purchase and would consider other Woolx products as a "go to" first choice!
customer_reviews.author: paul c

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: It's very soft and I love the colors. But, the stitching along the top edge was stitched too tight. Meaning that as soon as I pulled it over my head the thread began to unravel. I'm returning. Not sure if it's a one off one or not, but probably won't try again.
customer_reviews.author: spark girl

customer_reviews.title: Great wool
customer_reviews.text: Quality wool, not itchy at all and quite soft. Stays up on my face and I am a young female w average ~22in head circumference
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: nice gaitor
customer_reviews.text: It's a quality product however it didn't work for me as I was looking for something with more bulk. In formal situations it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but...
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful. The fabric is soft. The problem is the fit. It is small--kind of tight, and bunches up at the bottom of my neck so I can't really tuck it under a collar other than a turtleneck.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, soft, very warm, pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really wonderful gaiter. Very good quality, super warm and comfy on the face. Reversible. Beautiful color. I am a winter cyclist and it is perfect in the frigid weather. The double layer is perfect. One thing to know, it is snug, not loose.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hirschhorn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but wash before use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this neck gaiter. I wear it outside for work everyday. It does smell awful until the first wash which is why I gave it 4 instead of 5 starts. It’s meant to go over your face and nose so I highly recommend washing and *sit out to dry* before planning to wear it for an entire day.
customer_reviews.author: MS.Ott

customer_reviews.title: A great wardrobe addition
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the neck gaiter is excellent. This will be something I will be wearing from late fall to early spring. It is the perfect addition to layering.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Jahr

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this neck gaiter a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: I have had a old neck injury for many years, if my neck get cold, it's miserable and this keeps my neck warm,. This really did the job for me. I use if for the many hours outside doing the barn chores. It doesn't get wet and clammy like the fleece gaiter that I have been using. I am not very big, 5' and 109 lb. so it wasn't too tight for me at all, just right!
customer_reviews.author: Many horses

customer_reviews.title: Warm stays in place worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great it’s soft and you can pull it up over your face up to your eyes it stays the thickness is not too much and it’s not tight. I wear them all the time running around walking my dog, hiking they are easy to throw in a bag and so much better then a scarf. I have several in different types. The Merino wool is so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Will be using it for running in cool weather. Last year I was using a silk scarf, this will work a lot better and stay in place better. The bonus is wearing this plus black beanie gives you a ninja look.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Way to tight
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice feels nice but fits super tight when it’s all the way down on my neck feels like it’s choking this should be for women only
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: perfect biking face cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I use it for winter biking and I put a light infinity scarf under it. It didn't feel nice on my face, but I use a softer thin layer under it and it's perfect. It kind of "tames" my infinity scarf and keeps it in the right place for my face and head to stay warm under my bike helmet. It's a great color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Just went out for a 6 mile run with the weather being 19 degrees and I was snug as a bug. Long enough to cover my neck and nose at the same time. So glad I purchased this, I formerly had a turtle fur which was hard to breathe though and got wet with condensation easily making it cold. Two thumbs up. I hope it lasts exactly how it’s shaped for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: A warm neck!
customer_reviews.text: I have finally have something that keeps my entire neck warm. Since this is merino, it won't get clammy like polyester, and my neck will stay warm even if I sweat in it. Buy this, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: GF

customer_reviews.title: This is the most comfortable neck warmer ever
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because of the extreme weather we have been having in the north east. This is the most comfortable neck warmer ever ! The feel of this product is very luxurious and very comfortable and warm. Very well made and comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann cuhaj

customer_reviews.title: BRAVO
customer_reviews.text: Will repeat purchase soon (different color). Excellent product. Vibrant color. Super soft. Lightweight and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Doc McCracken

customer_reviews.title: Just right for walks on freezing days.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted--a wool neck warmer, not scratchy at all, very warm. It can be used balaclava style or folded as a hat or a head band too. The color is just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea G. Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Not bulky but very warm
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Well made. Stays up over nose. Thinner fabric, breathable but warm. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric though too  tight for me
customer_reviews.text: Good color and fabric but too tight for neck or headband - I like my neck gaiters on the loose side -
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Better Than a Scarf
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, very soft and comfortable (I'm male, 5-11). If you're using machines or tools, this will keep your neck as warm as a scarf, but with no hazard from dangling fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Near

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift for my sister and mother -- They LOVED it, it keeps them SUPER warm in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister and mother -- They LOVED it, it keeps them SUPER warm in the north east winters, and is VERY breathable. So glad I also bough this product and paid extra for it (instead of the run of the mill black neck gaiters you can get). Color is a darkish pink -- is what they mean by berry, which is good for girls.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: My go to neck gear for motorcycle rides in cold weather
customer_reviews.text: My go to neck gear for motorcycle rides in cold weather. Awesome to the touch. Keeps you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Open package
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. I have bought 4 different products in the last 2 weeks. Unfortunately one of the neck warmers I recieved was an open package. Must of been a return. Needless to say it ended up in the trash bin. Not blaming the manufacturer. Won't buy again due to open package.
customer_reviews.author: Ewen Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product was good and what I hoped for, except it was far too tight. It felt like a Tight turtleneck. I wanted something that would easily pull up over my lower face for warmth when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G Cobb

customer_reviews.title: A Most Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This gaiter is made from a high-tech merino wool and has been great during the recent cold and windy weather. Warm, soft & comfortable. I purchased a couple of extra ones so I can put one in the pocket of each of my heavy coats. +++++ Go WoolX +++++
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: ... the "bomb cyclone" in NYC and it was SO great. Wearing it hiking next
customer_reviews.text: Just wore this in the "bomb cyclone" in NYC and it was SO great. Wearing it hiking next. So much less bulk than a scarf and great for cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Petite size and utterly useless to me. Would be a marvelous warmer for a nearly neckless French Bulldog. Unfortunately, she wouldn't wear it either.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my Woolx gator
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, warm & light weight! It keeps me warm but I cannot even feel it is there. Never itchy or too hot. It feels softer every time I wear it! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Langer

customer_reviews.title: Great peice of winter snivel gear.
customer_reviews.text: This has become part of my cold weather gear. It is warm, lightweight, and can be utilized in several ways. During the short Texas winters we have brief cold snaps where cold weather clothing is necessary. And I have come to really love this neck gaiter for those times.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Threadgill

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully soft & warm gaiter!
customer_reviews.text: Another wonderful product from WoolX! Soft, feels good against face and neck. Does keep neck and chin warm in the cold. Rolls/folds down around the neck if not needed to reach chin. Does NOT feel confining.
customer_reviews.author: IndianaHappyTraveler

customer_reviews.title: They are soft
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my sons. They are soft. They haven't had to use them yet, so I am not sure how warm they will keep them. I am optimistic though.
customer_reviews.author: Earleen Dewar

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you think.
customer_reviews.text: These fit pretty tightly on me, and I’m a fairly small woman. They are fairly skimpy. Can’t see them working for a man or being really comfortable or warm. Returning them.
customer_reviews.author: a.lewis

customer_reviews.title: Very soft.
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than Turtle fur. It fits as expected, but would be nice to have a kids/child size too.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping cold air off the neck. Durable , soft , vibrant colors and a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: This gaiter is beautifully made and the wool is the softest I've found
customer_reviews.text: This gaiter is beautifully made and the wool is the softest I've found. I am a wool believer and I'm extremely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Farm up

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic - on time and in time for my cold ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic - on time and in time for my cold weather bike ride - warm and soft and comfortable - fits as expected and will buy again - Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Secular

customer_reviews.title: Super satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about running w/ a neck gaiter, but I'm so pleased with this product. In 30ish degree weather, it is the perfect weight and softness and offers great breathability. Home run purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey K

customer_reviews.title: perfect snug warm fit works as a giater, hat, or headband
customer_reviews.text: nice warm tube -kind of like a buff. love the economy of having a pattern on each side. nice shade of forest green can go from work to run
customer_reviews.author: Winged Creatures

customer_reviews.title: Ok but pretty sure not one size fits all
customer_reviews.text: wow... its really small when I open the package! - its ok for me (My neck is skinny) but I am pretty sure it is not "one size fits all"... Size of an iPad
customer_reviews.author: Bran

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Love this gaiter. It fits me perfectly-not at all cumbersome. Very soft and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Dlm

customer_reviews.title: It's also a good size. Tight enough to stay in place
customer_reviews.text: The wool is very soft as promised. It's also a good size. Tight enough to stay in place, but not so tight as to make me uncomfortable and I don't like things tight around my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Holt

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't made use of this yet, but am looking forward to using it. It feels soft and is lightweight. Nice and small in size. Removes the bulkiness of using a scarf.
customer_reviews.author: SandraW

customer_reviews.title: just right!
customer_reviews.text: good purchase. its comes in handy on the winter months and I don't have to worry about losing scarf every where now. Keeps my neck protected and warm all the time. Good for keeping your neck warm and helps me to be less susceptible for getting a cold.
customer_reviews.author: Paulenzo

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like that it doesn't hang down to get caught in things. It also doubles as an eye cover for sleeping in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: SANDY MASON

customer_reviews.title: Great For Motorcycle Riding
customer_reviews.text: Kept my neck warm on a motorcycle ride in the mountains. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R.

customer_reviews.title: Light but warm, perfect for running or hiking.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, thank you! Light but warm easy to store in my jacket pocket. Just ordered another one!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy LaBarbera

customer_reviews.title: Nice and double layered
customer_reviews.text: Very soft. Nice and double layered. Nice material. Gave 3 stars because it needs to be longer to cover nose and neck at the same time while skiing.
customer_reviews.author: Dacia

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service & product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of this gaitor & as well with the unparalleled efficiency of WoolX. I ordered another longer version & expect to be equally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Warm, but not toasty
customer_reviews.text: This is warm and breathable, but don't expect to feel toasty.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Jewett

customer_reviews.title: Kept me warm on recent rides in upstate NY in ...
customer_reviews.text: Kept me warm on recent rides in upstate NY in 40 degree weather. Fits snugly, but not too tight, my neck is 16.5-17". Absorbed sweat and stayed cozy. Soft and comfy, not itchy. I plan on ordering more so i have choices in color.
customer_reviews.author: chester thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping your face warm on cold nights
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping your face warm on cold nights. I wear this in the winter for all outdoor activity, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Shorter and snug.
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit short and snug. Not my favorite. Hoping to return.
customer_reviews.author: eacrowl

customer_reviews.title: Loved these better than fleece
customer_reviews.text: Way more warm and easy to breathe through compared to fleece and washes beautifully. We used them skiing in Vermont at -3 degrees. Colors were pretty too!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: I had problems finding a good neck gaiter till this one
customer_reviews.text: I had problems finding a good neck gaiter till this one. Purchased another so I will always have one available. The wool is much better than the synthetics.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer8

customer_reviews.title: Love, love,love.
customer_reviews.text: I love the soft feel of the gaiters and the colors available. I was also impressed with the speed of service.
customer_reviews.author: Betty A. Goen

customer_reviews.title: was not what I expected by looking at the picture ...
customer_reviews.text: was not what I expected by looking at the picture. It wasn't large enough and so thin. Looking at picture is appears to be thicker
customer_reviews.author: Denise K Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product, totally recommended!
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely love this product. She use it mostly as ear warmers.
customer_reviews.author: Idan Haibi

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little narrow/small - if someone wears a 16 ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little narrow/small - if someone wears a 16 inch shirt collar or bigger, it may be too tight
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Came in quickly and exactly as listed - will be used on Arctic cruise summer 2016
customer_reviews.author: Book lover

customer_reviews.title: Ouality Item
customer_reviews.text: Made of Merino Wool. Very comfy and warm,it's super light and thin too! It is truly one premium piece of woolen.
customer_reviews.author: TP_FAN

customer_reviews.title: This neck gaiter kept me very warm during my ski ...
customer_reviews.text: This neck gaiter kept me very warm during my ski trip. It's breathable, very soft, and didn't fog up my goggles going down the mountain. My only issue is that the top part of the gaiter that covered my nose and mouth kept rolling down whenever I would try to pull it up throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: sakurarwr

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It is too thin and short. The quality is as good as pure wool.
customer_reviews.author: SLX

customer_reviews.title: A nicely sewn gaiter.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely done. Not bulky at all - good for warmer weather walks and skiing.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: but does a nice job of keeping your neck warm
customer_reviews.text: Much thinner than i had expected, but does a nice job of keeping your neck warm. The wool never made me itch on my walks.
customer_reviews.author: Code Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Great Neck Gaiter
customer_reviews.text: It's a great neck gaiter. It's light yet warm and comfortable. I bought this for my wife, but I bought one last year and loved it so much I had to get her one.
customer_reviews.author: gary blose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my recent ski trip to Utah. Add warmth without bu, no sweaty mess here!
customer_reviews.author: Running mom

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Very soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Very soft and comfy. WAY better than my scarf for the super cold days!! Well made, nice fabric, nice color. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as warm as I thought. The pictures lie big time.
customer_reviews.author: kamal bennacer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The material is really nice, but it's too tight for my neck.
customer_reviews.author: solar

customer_reviews.title: Thin and warm
customer_reviews.text: The Woolx X501 Neck Gaiter is warm and can be worn over the mouth and nose as well as the neck. It is soft to the touch and not scratchy when worn. There is a seam, it is fairly smooth and I am not finding it to be bothersome. The one I ordered can be worn when reversed though there is a bit of green on the black side. Feels like the price is high for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: After getting the first one, I ordered 3 more. That's you everything about this. Good as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: LIMD

customer_reviews.title: Cannot wear comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: This is way too small for a grown man. Very tight on the neck. Cannot wear comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: John Kardys

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been cold enough to wear it. I washed it in cold water then dried it by hand and it didn't shrink. Good buy!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter who goes camping in the cold and she just loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Arnhold

customer_reviews.title: nice quality but on the small size for me gave ...
customer_reviews.text: nice quality but on the small size for me gave to wife also a bit thin for a heavyweight item
customer_reviews.author: aptrick j kennison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very warm and should serve its purpose next week skiing.
customer_reviews.author: MaraLou

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gaiter, while on the expensive side, is warm and stretches to fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: A little on the small side
customer_reviews.text: I guess I have an overly large head or this thing is a little on the small side since I can just barely get it over my head and down to my neck and then once it is there it is still pretty snug.
customer_reviews.author: Russell C

customer_reviews.title: It does not feel like a high quality item
customer_reviews.text: Smaller and thinner than I expected. It does not feel like a high quality item. For the price I had higher expectations.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: I rated this previously. if it were a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: I rated this previously. if it were a bit longer, it would cover my face and neck when I pull it up below my eyes. Otherwise, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: The Reader

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift. I know it was used.
customer_reviews.author: Joan A. Adams

customer_reviews.title: A bit small for me (I'm 6'1"). It keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit small for me (I'm 6'1"). It keeps the neck warm; sometimes too warm. I was hoping for something that I could pull over the top of my head but this gaiter is not thin or stretchy enough to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good thick merino wool will keep you warm. Quality is very good as well. Easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: tiburon

product_meta.title: Woolx Unisex Merino Wool Neck Gaiter For Men & Women - Warm and Soft
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :10 x 7.5 x 0.4 inches; 1.6 Ounces
 * Item model number :X501

feature_bullets: 100% Merino Wool - 18.5 Micron - Double layer of 230g/m² fabric

WARM & COZY: Cozy up to winter weather with one of our ultra-soft merino wool neck gaiters! More practical than the average scarf, it locks in warmth to help you brave the elements. It even retain heat when wet, perfect when conditions get snowy or windy.

AMAZING WARMTH, MIDWEIGHT GAITER: Cold weather doesn't mean you have to stay inside. Start with a merino wool base layer and a gaiter to cover your neck, mouth, and nose for the elements. Great for skiing, snowboarding, hiking, snow-blowing, you name it.

VERSATILE STYLE: 10" in length, our balaclava hood facemask protects more than just your neck! Use it as a scarf, mask, earwarmers, and headband too! With 2 layers of 230g/m merino wool,this is not a lightweight flimsy gaiter, this is ready for the cold!

PREMIUM QUALITY: Tired of the itchy, bulky fabrics typically used for winter apparel? We were too. That's why our products are made with 100% Merino Wool! Extremely warm and as soft as cashmere, machine washable & dryable.

SHOP RISK FREE: Once you experience the Woolx merino wool difference, there will be no looking back! We want you to try our neck gaiter risk free. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return your order, no questions asked.
